tool_description: TIN-check.com is a validation service for TIN numbers all around the world. This service allows you to search, discover, consult company TINs and even validate any TIN for the selected country. The Tax Identification Number (TIN) can assume different designations and format accordingly with the legislation of each country. Tax Number validation is available for more than 100 countries.
title: TIN Check

api_list.name: Get Token
api_list.description: This operation returns a token so that it can make requests to the tin number validation api
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://tin-check.p.rapidapi.com/api.php?op=gt"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tin-check.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: TIN Lookup
api_list.description: Through this operation you know if the tin number is valid or not and more information
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://tin-check.p.rapidapi.com/api.php?op=tl&tn=999999990&ca=pt&tk=required"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tin-check.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
